languages.text: {n}Брови преподобного ползут наверх.{/n} "Очень, очень щедрый и милостивый жест, Ваша Светлость! Я распоряжусь, чтобы отличившиеся на службе простолюдины могли попасть сюда. Таковое событие наполнит их рвением, и будут они передавать память об увиденном своим потомкам".

{n}Adalbert's eyebrows arch upward.{/n} "Truly a most generous and gracious gesture, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I will arrange for commoners who have distinguished themselves in their service to be allowed in here. An event like that will fill them with fervour, and they will pass down the memory of what they have seen to their offspring."
languages.original_text: {n}Брови преподобного ползут наверх.{/n} "Очень, очень щедрый и милостивый жест, Ваша Светлость! Я распоряжусь, чтобы отличившиеся на службе простолюдины могли попасть сюда. Таковое событие наполнит их рвением, и будут они передавать память об увиденном своим потомкам".

languages.text: {n}Adalbert hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Un geste ô combien généreux et bienveillant, Votre Seigneurie ! Je vais prendre les dispositions nécessaires pour que l'on autorise la visite des roturiers qui se sont distingués lors de leur service. Un tel privilège les remplira de ferveur et ils transmettront à leurs descendants le souvenir des splendeurs qu'ils auront vues ici. »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's eyebrows arch upward.{/n} "Truly a most generous and gracious gesture, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I will arrange for commoners who have distinguished themselves in their service to be allowed in here. An event like that will fill them with fervour, and they will pass down the memory of what they have seen to their offspring."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert hausse les sourcils.{/n} « Un geste ô combien généreux et bienveillant, Votre Seigneurie ! Je vais prendre les dispositions nécessaires pour que l'on autorise la visite des roturiers qui se sont distingués lors de leur service. Un tel privilège les remplira de ferveur et ils transmettront à leurs descendants le souvenir des splendeurs qu'ils auront vues ici. »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert enarca las cejas.{/n} «¡En verdad que se trata de un gesto magnánimo y considerado, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Dispondré que se permita visitar este lugar a los plebeyos que se hayan distinguido en su servicio. Tal honor renovará su fervor y legarán a sus descendientes el recuerdo de cuanto aquí vean».
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's eyebrows arch upward.{/n} "Truly a most generous and gracious gesture, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I will arrange for commoners who have distinguished themselves in their service to be allowed in here. An event like that will fill them with fervour, and they will pass down the memory of what they have seen to their offspring."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert enarca las cejas.{/n} «¡En verdad que se trata de un gesto magnánimo y considerado, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Dispondré que se permita visitar este lugar a los plebeyos que se hayan distinguido en su servicio. Tal honor renovará su fervor y legarán a sus descendientes el recuerdo de cuanto aquí vean».

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特扬起了眉毛。{/n}“您的提议真是无比慷慨、无比亲切，大人！我会安排那些表现出色的平民进入圣所。这样的安排会让他们充满虔诚，他们一定会把他们在这里看到的一切告诉他们的后人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's eyebrows arch upward.{/n} "Truly a most generous and gracious gesture, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I will arrange for commoners who have distinguished themselves in their service to be allowed in here. An event like that will fill them with fervour, and they will pass down the memory of what they have seen to their offspring."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特扬起了眉毛。{/n}“您的提议真是无比慷慨、无比亲切，大人！我会安排那些表现出色的平民进入圣所。这样的安排会让他们充满虔诚，他们一定会把他们在这里看到的一切告诉他们的后人。”

languages.text: {n}アダルバートは眉毛を釣り上げた。{/n}「実に気前がよく、寛大なお心遣いです、陛下！平民の中で功績のあった者をここに入れるよう手配しましょう。そのような催しは彼らを熱狂で満たし、ここで見たものの記憶を子孫に伝えることになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's eyebrows arch upward.{/n} "Truly a most generous and gracious gesture, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I will arrange for commoners who have distinguished themselves in their service to be allowed in here. An event like that will fill them with fervour, and they will pass down the memory of what they have seen to their offspring."

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートは眉毛を釣り上げた。{/n}「実に気前がよく、寛大なお心遣いです、陛下！平民の中で功績のあった者をここに入れるよう手配しましょう。そのような催しは彼らを熱狂で満たし、ここで見たものの記憶を子孫に伝えることになるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Adalbert hebt die Augenbrauen.{/n} "Wahrlich eine höchst großzügige und gütige Geste, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich sorge dafür, dass Mitglieder des Pöbels, die sich in ihrem Dienst hervorgetan haben, hier Zutritt erhalten. Ein solches Ereignis wird das Feuer ihres Glaubens gewiss zum Lodern bringen, und sie werden die Erinnerung an das Gesehene an ihre Nachfahren weitertragen."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's eyebrows arch upward.{/n} "Truly a most generous and gracious gesture, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I will arrange for commoners who have distinguished themselves in their service to be allowed in here. An event like that will fill them with fervour, and they will pass down the memory of what they have seen to their offspring."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert hebt die Augenbrauen.{/n} "Wahrlich eine höchst großzügige und gütige Geste, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich sorge dafür, dass Mitglieder des Pöbels, die sich in ihrem Dienst hervorgetan haben, hier Zutritt erhalten. Ein solches Ereignis wird das Feuer ihres Glaubens gewiss zum Lodern bringen, und sie werden die Erinnerung an das Gesehene an ihre Nachfahren weitertragen."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert'in kaşları kalkıyor.{/n} "Gerçekten de cömert ve lütufkâr bir jest {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Vazifelerindeki başarılarıyla öne çıkan sıradan yurttaşların buraya kabul edilmesini sağlayacağım. Böylesi bir etkinlik içlerini yoğun bir inançla dolduracaktır ve gördükleri şeyler, nesilden nesle aktaracakları birer anıya dönüşecektir."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert's eyebrows arch upward.{/n} "Truly a most generous and gracious gesture, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I will arrange for commoners who have distinguished themselves in their service to be allowed in here. An event like that will fill them with fervour, and they will pass down the memory of what they have seen to their offspring."
